00027 /*! \file alm.cc
00028  *  Class for storing spherical harmonic coefficients.
00029  *
00030  *  Copyright (C) 2003-2011 Max-Planck-Society
00031  *  \author Martin Reinecke
00032  */
00033 
00034 #include "alm.h"
00035 
00036 using namespace std;
00037 
00038 //static
00039 tsize Alm_Base::Num_Alms (int l, int m)
00040   {
00041   planck_assert(m<=l,"mmax must not be larger than lmax");
00042   return ((m+1)*(m+2))/2 + (m+1)*(l-m);
00043   }
00044 
00045 void Alm_Base::swap (Alm_Base &other)
00046   {
00047   std::swap(lmax, other.lmax);
00048   std::swap(mmax, other.mmax);
00049   std::swap(tval, other.tval);
00050   }
